CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 21, 1957, pg.1, reads: "GRIEF - STRICKEN SISTER - Joseph Royal Thompson and Mrs. Thomas L. West Sr. are shown assisting grief-stricken A. Marguerite Thompson from the Christian Tabernacle Church last Monday after funeral services were conducted for Miss Thompson's brother, Detective John B. Thompson.  Marguerite is the only sister and Joseph is one of the three brothers surviving. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Joseph Royal Thompson and Mrs. Thomas L. West Sr. leading Marguerite Thompson in front of group along exterior of Christian Tabernacle Church, for funeral of Detective John B. Thompson, Centre Avenue, Hill District
CatSubject_tab: Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Funeral rites and ceremonies--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Churches--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Christian Tabernacle Kodesh Church of Immanuel (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
